types.name: RfidRequestActualNumber
types.formula: SELECT ke_numbers."RecName" from ke_numbers WHERE status = '52e9190f-f319-4199-9308-cee6d7c79e31' and rfid_request = "rfid_request"."RecID" and recstate = 1 LIMIT 1

types.name: RfidRequestActualNumberId
types.formula: SELECT ke_numbers."RecID" from ke_numbers WHERE status = '52e9190f-f319-4199-9308-cee6d7c79e31' and rfid_request = "rfid_request"."RecID" and recstate = 1 LIMIT 1

types.name: rfid_request_requestor_id_caclulated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN rfid_request.requestor_id_from_op IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT reestr_members.fullname FROM reestr_members WHERE reestr_members.recid = rfid_request.requestor_id_from_op)  WHEN rfid_request.requestor_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT reestr_members.fullname FROM reestr_members WHERE reestr_members.recid = rfid_request.requestor_id) ELSE '' END)

types.name: rfid_request_rfid_count_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rfid_r.count FROM rfid_request AS rfid_r WHERE rfid_request.recid = rfid_r.recid AND rfid_r.recstate = 1)

types.name: rfid_request_pool_name_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rfid_r.recname FROM rfid_request AS rfid_r WHERE rfid_request.recid = rfid_r.recid AND rfid_r.recstate = 1)

types.name: rfid_request_application_number_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rfid_r.application_number FROM rfid_request AS rfid_r WHERE rfid_request.recid = rfid_r.recid AND rfid_r.recstate = 1)

types.name: log_reged_key_element_ke_number_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT reestr_key_elements.numberke FROM reestr_key_elements WHERE reestr_key_elements.recid = log.reged_key_element and reestr_key_elements.recstate = 1)

types.name: log_reged_key_element_manufacturer_number_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT reestr_key_elements.manufacturer_number FROM reestr_key_elements WHERE reestr_key_elements.recid = log.reged_key_element and reestr_key_elements.recstate = 1)

types.name: log_reged_key_element_key_element_code_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT dictionary_key_elements_codes.normative_name FROM reestr_key_elements JOIN dictionary_key_elements_codes on dictionary_key_elements_codes.recid = reestr_key_elements.key_element_code WHERE reestr_key_elements.recid = log.reged_key_element and reestr_key_elements.recstate = 1)

types.name: log_node_type_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT dictionary_ke_node_types.recname FROM dictionary_ke_node_types WHERE dictionary_ke_node_types.recid = log.node_type and dictionary_ke_node_types.recstate = 1)

types.name: log_node_unique_number_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT lg.node_unique_number FROM log as lg WHERE lg.recid = log.recid and lg.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_documentation_member_code
types.displayName: Код держателя КД/РКД в реестре участников

types.name: reestr_documentation_element_type_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then dkec.recname WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then dknt.recname ELSE '-' END FROM reestr_documentation rd LEFT JOIN dictionary_ke_node_types AS dknt ON rd.ke_node_type = dknt.recid LEFT JOIN dictionary_key_elements_codes AS dkec ON rd.key_element_code = dkec.recid WHERE rd.recid = reestr_documentation.recid AND rd.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_parts_type_template_date_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rpt.reccreated FROM reestr_parts_type as rpt WHERE rpt.recid = reestr_parts_type.recid and rpt.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_manufacturer_name
types.formula: (SELECT rm.fullname FROM reestr_members rm INNER JOIN rdev___auth_groupuser gu ON gu.groupid = rm.authgroup WHERE gu.userid = CAST(reestr_vehicles.reccreatedby AS uuid) LIMIT 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_manufacturer_code_name
types.formula: (select bc.code || ', ' || bc.recname from dictionary_branding_codes bc where bc.recid = reestr_vehicles.manufacturer_code)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_branding_code
types.formula: (SELECT bc.code FROM reestr_members rm INNER JOIN rdev___auth_groupuser gu ON gu.groupid = rm.authgroup INNER JOIN dictionary_branding_codes bc ON bc.recid = rm.branding_code WHERE gu.userid = CAST(reestr_vehicles.reccreatedby AS uuid) LIMIT 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_building_date_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rv.building_date FROM reestr_vehicles as rv WHERE rv.recid = reestr_vehicles.recid and rv.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_dictionary_models_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT dictionary_models.cipher || ', '|| dictionary_models.code  FROM dictionary_models WHERE dictionary_models.recid = reestr_vehicles.dictionary_models and dictionary_models.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_manufacturer_number_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rv.manufacturer_number FROM reestr_vehicles as rv WHERE rv.recid = reestr_vehicles.recid and rv.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_vagon_number_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rv.vagon_number FROM reestr_vehicles as rv WHERE rv.recid = reestr_vehicles.recid and rv.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_key_elements_blockchaintn_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rke.blockchaintn FROM reestr_key_elements as rke WHERE rke.recid = reestr_key_elements.recid and rke.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_certificate_end_date
types.displayName: Срок окончания действия сертификата - из сертификата

types.name: reestr_vehicles_elements_list_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CONCAT(count_installed_elements, ' из ', (select cast((coalesce(front_rear_detents, 0) + coalesce(gondola_hatches, 0) + coalesce(carts, 0) + coalesce(railway_carcass, 0) + coalesce(vagon_tank_bodies, 0) + coalesce(autocouplers, 0) + coalesce(absorbing_device, 0) + coalesce(traction_clamp, 0) + coalesce(air_distributor_assembled, 0) + coalesce(auto_mode, 0)) as text) from dictionary_count_ke_on_vagon where dictionary_count_ke_on_vagon.model_vagon = reestr_vehicles.dictionary_models and dictionary_count_ke_on_vagon.recstate = 1 limit 1)) FROM reestr_vehicles as rv WHERE rv.recid = reestr_vehicles.recid and rv.count_installed_elements is not null and rv.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_model_axes_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT dictionary_models.number_axes FROM dictionary_models WHERE dictionary_models.recid = reestr_vehicles.dictionary_models and dictionary_models.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_have_unregistered_elements_calculated
types.displayName: Учет установки всех СЧ/СЕ, установленных на этот вагон, ранее не производился
types.formula: (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT recid from reestr_key_elements WHERE vehicle = reestr_vehicles.recid AND recstate = 1 AND (is_registrated_installation ISNULL OR is_registrated_installation = FALSE) UNION SELECT recid from reestr_ke_nodes WHERE vehicle = reestr_vehicles.recid AND recstate = 1 AND (is_registrated_installation ISNULL OR is_registrated_installation = FALSE)) as rke) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END)

types.name: reestr_vehicles_have_unregistered_in_rzd_calc
types.displayName: Учет изготовления всех СЧ/СЕ, установленных на этот вагон, ранее не производился
types.formula: (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT recid from reestr_key_elements WHERE vehicle = reestr_vehicles.recid AND recstate = 1 AND (is_registratred_in_rzd ISNULL OR is_registratred_in_rzd = FALSE) UNION SELECT recid from reestr_ke_nodes WHERE vehicle = reestr_vehicles.recid AND recstate = 1 AND (is_registratred_in_rzd ISNULL OR is_registratred_in_rzd = FALSE)) as rke) > 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END)

types.name: reestr_members_branding_code_number
types.formula: SELECT CONCAT(code, ',', full_name) fullname FROM dictionary_branding_codes WHERE recid = "reestr_members"."branding_code" and recstate = 1 LIMIT 1

types.name: reestr_members_branding_code_recname
types.formula: SELECT recname FROM dictionary_branding_codes WHERE recid = "reestr_members"."branding_code" and recstate = 1 LIMIT 1

types.name: rfid_request_status_calculated
types.formula: SELECT CASE quote_nullable(cast(rfid_request.rfid_request_status as text)) WHEN 'NULL' THEN 'Новая' WHEN '' THEN 'Новая' ELSE CASE length(cast(rfid_request.rfid_request_status as text)) WHEN 0 THEN 'Новая' ELSE CASE cast(rfid_request.rfid_request_status as text) WHEN '0' THEN 'Новая' WHEN '1' THEN 'Новая' WHEN '2' THEN 'Генерация' WHEN '3' THEN 'Сгенерированы' WHEN '4' THEN 'Записаны' WHEN '5' THEN 'Заявление сгенерировано' WHEN '6' THEN 'Отправлено в Росжелдор' WHEN '7' THEN 'Принято' WHEN '8' THEN 'Отказано'  WHEN '9' THEN 'Сгенерировано оператором Росжелдора'  WHEN '10' THEN 'Результат отправлен владельцу' WHEN '11' THEN 'Отправка' WHEN '12' THEN 'Ошибка отправки' WHEN '13' THEN 'Генерация УИН' END END END

types.name: rfid_request_notification_files_signstatus
types.formula: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles LEFT JOIN rdev___syssignfiles ON rdev___syssignfiles.fileid = rdev___sysfiles.recid WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'notification_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = rfid_request.recid AND rdev___syssignfiles.isverify = true) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'notification_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = rfid_request.recid)THEN true ELSE false END

types.name: rfid_request_application_files_signstatus
types.formula: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles LEFT JOIN rdev___syssignfiles ON rdev___syssignfiles.fileid = rdev___sysfiles.recid WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'application_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = rfid_request.recid AND rdev___syssignfiles.isverify = true) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'application_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = rfid_request.recid)THEN true ELSE false END

types.name: rfid_request_application_file_from_op_exist_calculated
types.displayName: Приложен ли файл заявления (при создании в АРМ Росжелдор)
types.formula: select case when count(*)>0 then true else false end from rdev___sysfiles where entityid=rfid_request.recid and columnname = 'application_file_from_op' and recstate = 1

types.name: rfid_request_signstatus_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM rdev___syssignfiles LEFT JOIN rdev___sysfiles ON rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'reportregisternumbersapplication.pdf' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = rfid_request.recid WHERE rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'reportregisternumbersapplication.pdf' AND (rdev___syssignfiles.reccreatedby = 'numbergenerator1' OR rdev___syssignfiles.reccreatedby = 'numbergenerator2' OR rdev___syssignfiles.reccreatedby = 'numbergenerator3') AND rdev___syssignfiles is not null AND rdev___syssignfiles.fileid = rdev___sysfiles.recid AND rdev___syssignfiles.isverify IS TRUE)

types.name: rfid_request_readonly_text
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 'Для создания заявления нажмите кнопку "Создать заявление"' END FROM rfid_request as rf WHERE rf.recid = rfid_request.recid)

types.name: reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration_show_generated_files_calculated
types.formula: select case when count(*)>0 then true else false end from rdev___sysfiles where entityid=reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid and columnname = 'generated_application_file' and recstate = 1

types.name: reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration_reason1
types.displayName: Основание для учета СЧ: изготовление составной части

types.name: reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration_reason2
types.displayName: Основание для учета СЧ: установка составной части на грузовой вагон

types.name: reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration_reason_calculated
types.displayName: Основание для учета составных частей грузовых вагонов
types.formula: select CASE WHEN reason1 and reason2 THEN 'изготовление составной части; установка составной части на грузовой вагон' WHEN reason1 THEN 'изготовление составной части' WHEN reason2 THEN 'установка составной части на грузовой вагон' ELSE rag.reason END FROM reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration AS rag WHERE rag.recid = reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid AND rag.recstate = 1

types.name: reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration_signstatus_calculated
types.formula: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles LEFT JOIN rdev___syssignfiles ON rdev___syssignfiles.fileid = rdev___sysfiles.recid WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'notice_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid AND rdev___syssignfiles.isverify = true) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'notice_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid)THEN true ELSE false END

types.name: reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration_result_signstatus_calculated
types.formula: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles LEFT JOIN rdev___syssignfiles ON rdev___syssignfiles.fileid = rdev___sysfiles.recid WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'result_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid AND rdev___syssignfiles.isverify = true) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rdev___sysfiles WHERE rdev___sysfiles.columnname = 'result_file' AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid)THEN true ELSE false END

types.name: reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration_accept_and_signstatus_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END FROM rdev___syssignfiles LEFT JOIN rdev___sysfiles ON (rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Результат учета СЧ.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Результат учета СЕ.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Результат учета узла.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Результат для учета СЧ, выпущенного в арме производителя.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Результат для учета СЕ, выпущенного в арме производителя.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Результат для учета ТС, выпущенного в арме производителя.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете СЧ.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете узла.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете СЕ.pdf' OR rdev___sysfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете ТС.pdf') AND rdev___sysfiles.entityid = reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid WHERE (rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Результат учета СЧ.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Результат учета СЕ.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Результат учета узла.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Результат для учета СЧ, выпущенного в арме производителя.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Результат для учета СЕ, выпущенного в арме производителя.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Результат для учета ТС, выпущенного в арме производителя.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете СЧ.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете узла.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете СЕ.pdf' OR rdev___syssignfiles.recname = 'Отказ в учете ТС.pdf') AND (rdev___syssignfiles.reccreatedby = 'operatorroszeldor' OR rdev___syssignfiles.reccreatedby = 'headroszeldor') AND rdev___syssignfiles is not null AND rdev___syssignfiles.fileid = rdev___sysfiles.recid AND rdev___syssignfiles.isverify IS TRUE)

types.name: mapping_table_value_sp_calculated
types.formula: SELECT CASE WHEN owner_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT reestr_members.fullname FROM reestr_members WHERE reestr_members.recid = owner_value_sp) WHEN ke_manufacturer_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_branding_codes.code FROM dictionary_branding_codes WHERE dictionary_branding_codes.recid = ke_manufacturer_value_sp) WHEN method_of_marking_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_method_of_marking.recname FROM dictionary_method_of_marking WHERE dictionary_method_of_marking.recid = method_of_marking_value_sp) WHEN method_of_encoding_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_method_of_encoding.recname FROM dictionary_method_of_encoding WHERE dictionary_method_of_encoding.recid = method_of_encoding_value_sp) WHEN key_element_code_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_key_elements_codes.recname FROM dictionary_key_elements_codes WHERE dictionary_key_elements_codes.recid = key_element_code_value_sp) WHEN ke_node_type_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_ke_node_types.recname FROM dictionary_ke_node_types WHERE dictionary_ke_node_types.recid = ke_node_type_value_sp) WHEN documentation_number_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT reestr_documentation.detail FROM reestr_documentation WHERE reestr_documentation.recid = documentation_number_value_sp) WHEN billet_manufacturer_info_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_billet_manufacturer_details.billet_manufacturer_name FROM dictionary_billet_manufacturer_details WHERE dictionary_billet_manufacturer_details.recid = billet_manufacturer_info_value_sp) WHEN certificate_number_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT reestr_certificates.registration_number FROM reestr_certificates WHERE reestr_certificates.recid = certificate_number_value_sp) WHEN steel_grade_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_steel_grade.recname FROM dictionary_steel_grade WHERE dictionary_steel_grade.recid = steel_grade_value_sp) WHEN administration_code_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_administration_codes.recname FROM dictionary_administration_codes WHERE dictionary_administration_codes.recid = administration_code_value_sp) WHEN auto_mode_cargo_model_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_auto_mode_cargo_models.recname FROM dictionary_auto_mode_cargo_models WHERE dictionary_auto_mode_cargo_models.recid = auto_mode_cargo_model_value_sp) WHEN air_distributor_model_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_air_distributor_models.recname FROM dictionary_air_distributor_models WHERE dictionary_air_distributor_models.recid = air_distributor_model_value_sp) WHEN autocoupler_model_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_couplings_models.coupling_name FROM dictionary_couplings_models WHERE dictionary_couplings_models.recid = autocoupler_model_value_sp) WHEN absorbing_model_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_absorbing_device_body_models.recname FROM dictionary_absorbing_device_body_models WHERE dictionary_absorbing_device_body_models.recid = absorbing_model_value_sp) WHEN absorbing_class_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_class_absorbing_device.recname FROM dictionary_class_absorbing_device WHERE dictionary_class_absorbing_device.recid = absorbing_class_value_sp) WHEN specialization_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_specializations.spec_name FROM dictionary_specializations WHERE dictionary_specializations.recid = specialization_value_sp) WHEN truck_type_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_type_cart.recname FROM dictionary_type_cart WHERE dictionary_type_cart.recid = truck_type_value_sp) WHEN truck_model_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_truck_models.recname FROM dictionary_truck_models WHERE dictionary_truck_models.recid = truck_model_value_sp) WHEN main_part_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_names_main_part_air_distributor.recname FROM dictionary_names_main_part_air_distributor WHERE dictionary_names_main_part_air_distributor.recid = main_part_value_sp) WHEN line_part_value_sp IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT dictionary_names_line_part_air_distributor.recname FROM dictionary_names_line_part_air_distributor WHERE dictionary_names_line_part_air_distributor.recid = line_part_value_sp) END

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_is_max_count_child
types.formula: SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM reestr_key_elements WHERE ke_node = reestr_ke_nodes.recid) + (SELECT count(*) FROM reestr_ke_nodes as rke WHERE rke.parent_ke_node = reestr_ke_nodes.recid and (rke.ke_node_type = 'c790c624-b93e-498b-97ba-0fb47f8b4b52')) >= (SELECT CASE WHEN air_distributor_count notnull THEN air_distributor_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN trunk_part_air_distributor_count notnull THEN trunk_part_air_distributor_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN traction_clamp_count notnull THEN traction_clamp_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN absorbing_device_count notnull THEN absorbing_device_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN slider_body_count notnull THEN slider_body_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN slider_cap_count notnull THEN slider_cap_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_slider_external_count notnull THEN spring_slider_external_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_slider_internal_count notnull THEN spring_slider_internal_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_suspension_under_wedge_external_count notnull THEN spring_suspension_under_wedge_external_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_suspension_under_wedge_internal_count notnull THEN spring_suspension_under_wedge_internal_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_suspension_external_count notnull THEN spring_suspension_external_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_suspension_internal_count notnull THEN spring_suspension_internal_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN triangel_count notnull THEN triangel_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN wheel_pair_count notnull THEN wheel_pair_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN wheel_pair_without_slip_knots_count notnull THEN wheel_pair_without_slip_knots_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN side_frame_count notnull THEN side_frame_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN pressure_beam_count notnull THEN pressure_beam_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN clear_axis_count notnull THEN clear_axis_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN wheel_count notnull THEN wheel_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN friction_strip_count notnull THEN friction_strip_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN brace_count notnull THEN brace_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN bearing_adapter_count notnull THEN bearing_adapter_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN friction_wedge_count notnull THEN friction_wedge_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN wedge_pockets_count notnull THEN wedge_pockets_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN saddle_ring_count notnull THEN saddle_ring_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN wedge_pockets_inserts_count notnull THEN wedge_pockets_inserts_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN saddle_bushing_count notnull THEN saddle_bushing_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_otside_after notnull THEN spring_otside_after ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_inside_after notnull THEN spring_inside_after ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_slider_outside notnull THEN spring_slider_outside ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN spring_slider_inside notnull THEN spring_slider_inside ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN bearing_node notnull THEN bearing_node ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN lock_count notnull THEN lock_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN elevator_roll_count notnull THEN elevator_roll_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN auto_coupler_count notnull THEN auto_coupler_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN absorbing_device_body_count notnull THEN absorbing_device_body_count ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN rough_axis_count notnull THEN rough_axis_count ELSE 0 END FROM dictionary_count_key_elements_by_node_type dict WHERE dict.ke_node_type = reestr_ke_nodes.ke_node_type AND dict.scheme = reestr_ke_nodes.documentation_number AND dict.recstate = 1 ORDER BY dict.reccreated DESC LIMIT 1)

types.name: dictionary_billet_manufacturer_details_name_type_element_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then dkec.recname WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then dknt.recname ELSE '-' END FROM dictionary_billet_manufacturer_details rd LEFT JOIN dictionary_ke_node_types AS dknt ON rd.ke_node_type = dknt.recid LEFT JOIN dictionary_key_elements_codes AS dkec ON rd.key_element_code = dkec.recid WHERE rd.recid = dictionary_billet_manufacturer_details.recid AND rd.recstate = 1)

types.name: dictionary_steel_grade_name_type_element_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then dkec.recname WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then dknt.recname ELSE '-' END FROM dictionary_steel_grade rd LEFT JOIN dictionary_ke_node_types AS dknt ON rd.ke_node_type = dknt.recid LEFT JOIN dictionary_key_elements_codes AS dkec ON rd.key_element_code = dkec.recid WHERE rd.recid = dictionary_steel_grade.recid AND rd.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_certificates_name_type_element_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then '-' WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NOT NULL then dkec.recname WHEN rd.ke_node_type IS NOT NULL and rd.key_element_code IS NULL then dknt.recname ELSE '-' END FROM reestr_certificates rd LEFT JOIN dictionary_ke_node_types AS dknt ON rd.ke_node_type = dknt.recid LEFT JOIN dictionary_key_elements_codes AS dkec ON rd.key_element_code = dkec.recid WHERE rd.recid = reestr_certificates.recid AND rd.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_key_elements_application_id_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN reestr_key_elements.application_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT 'Учтено на '::text|| reestr_members.fullname from reestr_members where reestr_members.recid = reestr_key_elements.manufacturer_details) ELSE '' END)

types.name: reestr_key_elements_application_exists
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN reestr_key_elements.application_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recname from reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration where reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid = reestr_key_elements.application_id) ELSE null END)

types.name: correction_request_object_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT reestr_key_elements.numberke FROM reestr_key_elements WHERE reestr_key_elements.recid = correction_request.objectid and reestr_key_elements.recstate = 1) NOTNULL THEN (SELECT reestr_key_elements.numberke FROM reestr_key_elements WHERE reestr_key_elements.recid = correction_request.objectid and reestr_key_elements.recstate = 1) ELSE (SELECT reestr_ke_nodes.unique_number FROM reestr_ke_nodes WHERE reestr_ke_nodes.recid = correction_request.objectid and reestr_ke_nodes.recstate = 1) END)

types.name: reestr_batch_is_assembly_unit
types.description: Поле, определяюший был ли добавлен СЕ/СЧ первым в партию. Если СЧ = 1, СЕ = 2, 0 - первоначальное состояние

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_recipient_droplist_group
types.description: Поле для настройки видимости кнопки Подтвердить получение

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_batch_status_calculated
types.formula: select bs.reccode from reestr_batch rb left join dictionary_batch_status bs on rb.batch_status = bs.recid where rb.recid = reestr_ke_nodes.batchid

types.name: reestr_key_elements_parent_has_correct_request
types.formula: (select case when (select status from reestr_ke_nodes rkn where rkn.recid = reestr_key_elements.ke_node) = '1df3eb18-73d0-4094-86af-134c592b0723' then true else false end)
types.description: Флаг, который определяет есть ли запрос на корректировку родительского элемента

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_parent_has_correct_request
types.formula: (select case when (select status from reestr_ke_nodes rkn where rkn.recid = reestr_ke_nodes.parent_ke_node) = '1df3eb18-73d0-4094-86af-134c592b0723' then true else false end)
types.description: Флаг, который определяет есть ли запрос на корректировку родительского элемента

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_child_has_correct_request
types.formula: select case when ('c0221145-9593-46ec-bc72-b883554ea00d' in (select statuske from reestr_key_elements rke where rke.ke_node=reestr_ke_nodes.recid) or '1df3eb18-73d0-4094-86af-134c592b0723' in (select status from reestr_ke_nodes rkn where rkn.parent_ke_node=reestr_ke_nodes.recid)) then true else false end
types.description: Флаг, который определяет есть ли запрос на корректировку дочернего элемента

types.name: reestr_key_elements_neighbour_has_correct_request
types.formula: select case when ('c0221145-9593-46ec-bc72-b883554ea00d' in (select statuske from reestr_key_elements rke where rke.ke_node=reestr_key_elements.ke_node) or '1df3eb18-73d0-4094-86af-134c592b0723' in (select status from reestr_ke_nodes rkn where rkn.parent_ke_node=reestr_key_elements.ke_node)) then true else false end
types.description: Флаг, который определяет есть ли запрос на корректировку соседнего элемента

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_neighbour_has_correct_request
types.formula: select case when ('c0221145-9593-46ec-bc72-b883554ea00d' in (select statuske from reestr_key_elements rke where rke.ke_node=reestr_ke_nodes.parent_ke_node) or '1df3eb18-73d0-4094-86af-134c592b0723' in (select status from reestr_ke_nodes rkn where rkn.parent_ke_node=reestr_ke_nodes.parent_ke_node)) then true else false end
types.description: Флаг, который определяет есть ли запрос на корректировку дочернего элемента

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_application_id_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN reestr_ke_nodes.application_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT 'Учтено на '::text|| reestr_members.fullname from reestr_members where reestr_members.recid = reestr_ke_nodes.manufacturer_details) ELSE '' END)

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_application_exists
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN reestr_ke_nodes.application_id IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recname from reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration where reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid = reestr_ke_nodes.application_id) ELSE null END)

types.name: reestr_key_elements_last_event
types.formula: (select log.ke_action from log where log.recstate = 1 and log.reged_key_element = reestr_key_elements.recid order by log.reccreated DESC limit 1)

types.name: reestr_key_elements_last_event_calculated
types.formula: (select log.recid from log where log.recstate = 1 and log.reged_key_element = reestr_key_elements.recid order by log.reccreated DESC limit 1)

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_last_event
types.formula: (select node_log.action from node_log where node_log.recstate = 1 and node_log.nodeid = reestr_ke_nodes.recid order by node_log.reccreated DESC limit 1)

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_last_event_calculated
types.formula: (select node_log.recid from node_log where node_log.recstate = 1 and node_log.nodeid = reestr_ke_nodes.recid order by node_log.reccreated DESC limit 1)

types.name: branding_codes_and_short_name_calculated
types.formula: select concat(dbc."code", ',' , dbc."recname") fullname from dictionary_branding_codes as dbc where dbc.recid = "dictionary_branding_codes"."recid" limit 1

types.name: dictionary_branding_code
types.formula: select code from dictionary_branding_codes where recid = dictionary_branding_codes_to_work.branding_codes_object_with_short_name

types.name: integration_electronic_inspector_is_consignee
types.formula: select is_consignee from integration_electronic_inspector iei where iei.fullname_member=reestr_batch.member and (iei.key_element_code=reestr_batch.product_name or iei.ke_node_type=reestr_batch.product_name) and recstate = 1 LIMIT 1

types.name: mapping_table_documentation_number_calculated
types.description: Поле для вывода в табличное представление
types.formula: (SELECT reestr_documentation.detail FROM reestr_documentation WHERE reestr_documentation.recid = mapping_table.documentation_number and reestr_documentation.recstate = 1)

types.name: ke_log_application_id_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN log.application_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recname FROM reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration WHERE reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid = log.application_id) THEN (SELECT 'Учтено на '::text|| reestr_members.fullname from reestr_members where reestr_members.recid = (select manufacturer_details FROM reestr_key_elements WHERE reestr_key_elements.recid = log.reged_key_element)) ELSE '' END)

types.name: node_log_application_id_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN node_log.application_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recname FROM reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration WHERE reestr_applications_for_key_elements_registration.recid = node_log.application_id)THEN (SELECT 'Учтено на '::text|| reestr_members.fullname from reestr_members where reestr_members.recid = (select manufacturer_details FROM reestr_ke_nodes WHERE reestr_ke_nodes.recid = node_log.nodeid)) ELSE '' END)

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_main_parent_status_calculated
types.formula: (WITH res AS (select rks.recid, rks.status, rks.parent_ke_node from reestr_ke_nodes rks where rks.recid = reestr_ke_nodes.parent_ke_node) SELECT CASE WHEN res.parent_ke_node NOTNULL THEN (SELECT rks2.status::text FROM reestr_ke_nodes rks2 where rks2.recid = res.parent_ke_node) ELSE res.status::text END FROM res)

types.name: send_request_tasks_date_xml_electronic_inspector
types.displayName: Дата формирования документа в АС 'Цифровой инспектор'

types.name: send_request_tasks_is_test_response
types.description: Эмуляция ответов от ЭИ на get запросы

types.name: send_request_tasks_status_text
types.description: Поле для эмуляции статуса на отправленный xml, сюда прописываем статус, который нужно, чтоб присвоился документу

types.name: counting_completed_operations_reestr_members_inn_calculated
types.formula: SELECT rm.INN from reestr_members as rm WHERE rm.recid = member_inn LIMIT 1

types.name: counting_completed_operations_dictionary_transaction_prices_operation_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN dtp.operation = 1 THEN 'Регистрация электронного паспорта' WHEN dtp.operation = 2 THEN 'Регистрация ремонта' END FROM dictionary_transaction_prices AS dtp WHERE dtp.recid = counting_completed_operations.operation and recstate = 1 LIMIT 1)

types.name: make_group_tasks_node_log_content
types.displayName: Состав СЕ (для логирования события выпуска в обращение)

types.name: log_event_calculated
types.formula: select dka.recname from dictionary_ke_actions as dka where dka.recid = confirm_request_queue.element_action

types.name: node_log_event_calculated
types.formula: select dna.recname from dictionary_node_actions as dna where dna.recid = confirm_request_queue.node_action

types.name: confirm_request_element_calculated
types.formula: select rke.numberke from reestr_key_elements as rke where rke.recid = confirm_request_queue.element

types.name: confirm_request_node_calculated
types.formula: select rkn.unique_number from reestr_ke_nodes as rkn where rkn.recid = confirm_request_queue.node

types.name: confirm_request_event
types.formula: (SELECT CASE WHEN element_event notnull THEN element_event ELSE node_event END FROM confirm_request_queue Limit 1)

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_is_event_confirmed
types.formula: select is_event_confirmed from node_log where node_log.nodeid = reestr_ke_nodes.recid order by reccreated desc limit 1

types.name: reestr_key_elements_is_event_confirmed
types.formula: select is_event_confirmed from log where log.reged_key_element = reestr_key_elements.recid order by reccreated desc limit 1

types.name: reestr_key_elements_date_manufacture_text_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rke.date_manufacture_text FROM reestr_key_elements as rke WHERE rke.recid = reestr_key_elements.recid and rke.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_key_elements_branding_code_certificate_number_relation
types.description: Регистрационный номер свидетельства о присвоении номера для клеймения

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_date_manufacture_text_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT rke.date_manufacture_text FROM reestr_ke_nodes as rke WHERE rke.recid = reestr_ke_nodes.recid and rke.recstate = 1)

types.name: reestr_ke_nodes_branding_code_certificate_number_relation
types.description: Регистрационный номер свидетельства о присвоении номера для клеймения

types.name: reestr_documentation_detail_and_member_calculated
types.formula: SELECT CONCAT(rd.detail, ', ', rd.recname) full_detail from reestr_documentation as rd WHERE rd.recid = reestr_documentation.recid LIMIT 1

contextButtons.visible: function () { var user_groups = JSON.parse(activeUser.groups); if (!!user_groups) { var user_group = user_groups.find(x => x === '644501fd-2039-459c-93e9-8bbd047dec33' || x === '44e87caf-bb74-4d9a-ac37-64a6aba8d8d8' || x == '1a62f2f0-fd34-497b-b6c2-6d85505e87ac'); if (selectedRecords.length != 1) { return false; } if (!!user_group) { for (var k = 0; k < selectedRecords.length; k++) { if (selectedRecords[k].rfid_request_status_calculated == 'Отправлено в Росжелдор' || selectedRecords[k].rfid_request_status_calculated == 'Принято' || selectedRecords[k].rfid_request_status_calculated == 'Отказано' || selectedRecords[k].rfid_request_status_calculated == 'Отправка' || selectedRecords[k].rfid_request_status_calculated == 'Ошибка отправки' || selectedRecords[k].rfid_request_status_calculated == 'Результат отправлен владельцу') { return false; } } return true; } else { return false; } } else { return false; } }
